title: The Red Pony (1949 - USA) [Robert Mitchum] family western
description:
The Red Pony (1949 - USA)

Drama / Family / Western

story by . . . . John Steinbeck
starring . . . . Myrna Loy, Robert Mitchum, Louis Calhern, Beau Bridges
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0041792/


Filmed at Agoura, California, USA

John Steinbeck adapted his own stories into this warmhearted screenplay about a farm boy who learns about responsibility when he's given his own pony. Keen observations of family dynamics make this a standout, along with Tony Gaudio's Technicolor camerawork and a justly famous score by Aaron Copland.
